risks.name: HyperShiftKubeAPIPort443
risks.message: Hosted/HyperShift clusters where HostedCluster spec.networking.apiServer.port is 443 can have trouble with Pods on compute Nodes connecting to the internal Kubernetes API service via the service IP.

promql.promql:
group by (_id, invoker) (cluster_installer{_id="",invoker="hypershift"})
or
0 * group by (_id, invoker) (cluster_installer{_id=""})

risks.name: OVNIPsecConnectivity
risks.message: OVN clusters with enabled IPsec may lose pod to pod communication between a set of nodes which may impact overall functionality of the cluster and even cause production outage.

promql.promql:
(
  group by (ipsec) (label_replace(max_over_time(ovnkube_controller_ipsec_enabled{_id=""}[1h]), "ipsec", "enabled", "", "") == 1)
  or on (_id)
  0 * group by (ipsec) (label_replace(max_over_time(ovnkube_controller_ipsec_enabled{_id=""}[1h]), "ipsec", "disabled", "", "") == 0)
) and on (_id) (
  group by (resource) (max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id="",resource="egressips.k8s.ovn.org"}[1h]))
)
or on (_id)
0 * group(max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id=""}[1h]))

risks.name: OVNIPsecPausedMCPConnectivity
risks.message: OVN clusters with enabled IPsec with multiple worker MachineConfigPools may lose SDN connectivity during updates when at least one worker MCP is paused.

promql.promql:
(
  group by (ipsec) (label_replace(max_over_time(ovnkube_controller_ipsec_enabled{_id=""}[1h]), "ipsec", "enabled", "", "") == 1)
  or on (_id)
  0 * group by (ipsec) (label_replace(max_over_time(ovnkube_controller_ipsec_enabled{_id=""}[1h]), "ipsec", "disabled", "", "") == 0)
) and on (_id) (
  group by (resource) (max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id="",resource="egressips.k8s.ovn.org"}[1h]))
  and on (_id)
  group by (resource) (max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id="",resource="machineconfigpools.machineconfiguration.openshift.io"}[1h] ) > 2)
)
or on (_id)
0 * group(max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id=""}[1h]))

risks.name: OpenStackAvailabilityZoneOutOfRange
risks.message: OpenStack clusters with more compute availability zones than storage availability zones can lose the ability to provision or deprovision Cinder CSI volumes.

promql.promql:
group by (_id, type) (cluster_infrastructure_provider{_id="",type="OpenStack"})
or on (_id)
0 * group by (_id, type) (cluster_infrastructure_provider{_id=""})

risks.name: OVNIPsecConnectivity
risks.message: OVN clusters with enabled IPsec may lose pod to pod communication between a set of nodes which may impact overall functionality of the cluster and even cause production outage.

promql.promql:
(
  group by (ipsec) (label_replace(max_over_time(ovnkube_controller_ipsec_enabled{_id=""}[1h]), "ipsec", "enabled", "", "") == 1)
  or on (_id)
  0 * group by (ipsec) (label_replace(max_over_time(ovnkube_controller_ipsec_enabled{_id=""}[1h]), "ipsec", "disabled", "", "") == 0)
) and on (_id) (
  group by (resource) (max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id="",resource="egressips.k8s.ovn.org"}[1h]))
)
or on (_id)
0 * group(max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id=""}[1h]))

risks.name: OVNIPsecPausedMCPConnectivity
risks.message: OVN clusters with enabled IPsec with multiple worker MachineConfigPools may lose SDN connectivity during updates when at least one worker MCP is paused.

promql.promql:
(
  group by (ipsec) (label_replace(max_over_time(ovnkube_controller_ipsec_enabled{_id=""}[1h]), "ipsec", "enabled", "", "") == 1)
  or on (_id)
  0 * group by (ipsec) (label_replace(max_over_time(ovnkube_controller_ipsec_enabled{_id=""}[1h]), "ipsec", "disabled", "", "") == 0)
) and on (_id) (
  group by (resource) (max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id="",resource="egressips.k8s.ovn.org"}[1h]))
  and on (_id)
  group by (resource) (max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id="",resource="machineconfigpools.machineconfiguration.openshift.io"}[1h] ) > 2)
)
or on (_id)
0 * group(max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id=""}[1h]))

risks.name: ServiceAccountsOAuth
risks.message: ServiceAccounts cannot be used as OAuth2 clients in clusters where internal image registry is disabled.

promql.promql:
bottomk(1,
  0 * group by (deployment) (kube_deployment_spec_replicas{_id="",namespace="openshift-image-registry",deployment="image-registry"} > 0)
  or
  group(kube_deployment_spec_replicas{_id=""})
)

risks.name: HyperShiftKubeAPIPort443
risks.message: Hosted/HyperShift clusters where HostedCluster spec.networking.apiServer.port is 443 can have trouble with Pods on compute Nodes connecting to the internal Kubernetes API service via the service IP.

promql.promql:
group by (_id, invoker) (cluster_installer{_id="",invoker="hypershift"})
or
0 * group by (_id, invoker) (cluster_installer{_id=""})

risks.name: HyperShiftNodePoolSkewBinaryDownload
risks.message: Hosted/HyperShift clusters where HostedCluster is on an exposed release can fail to create new nodes for NodePools on 4.14.(z<34) and 4.15.(z<23).

promql.promql:
group by (_id, invoker) (cluster_installer{_id="",invoker="hypershift"})
or
0 * group by (_id, invoker) (cluster_installer{_id=""})

  group by (resource) (max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id="",resource="egressips.k8s.ovn.org"}[1h]))

risks.name: CephCapDropPanic
risks.message: Nodes in clusters running workloads that mount Ceph volumes may experience kernel panics due to a CephFS client bug.

promql.promql:
topk(1,
  label_replace(group(ceph_health_status{_id=""}), "ceph", "yes", "", "")
  or
  label_replace(0 * group(cluster_version{_id=""}), "ceph", "no", "", "")
)

risks.name: HighNodeStatusReportFrequency
risks.message: An unintended reversion to the default kubelet nodeStatusReportFrequency can cause significant load on the control plane.

risks.name: AWSCustomDomainNodesNotReady
risks.message: Nodes on AWS with custom domain names will go to NotReady state.

promql.promql:
(
  group by (type) (cluster_infrastructure_provider{_id="",type="AWS"})
  or
  0 * group by (type) (cluster_infrastructure_provider{_id=""})
)

risks.name: EarlyAPICertRotation
risks.message: Clusters born in 4.7 and earlier will trigger an api-int certificate authority rollout, and bugs in that rollout may break kubelet access to the Kubernetes API service.

promql.promql:
topk(1,
  label_replace(group by (version) (cluster_version{_id="",type="initial",version=~"4[.][0-9][.].*"}),"born_by_4_9", "yes, so possibly actually born in 4.7 or earlier", "", "")
  or
  label_replace(0 * group by (version) (cluster_version{_id="",type="initial",version!~"4[.][0-9][.].*"}),"born_by_4_9", "no, born in 4.10 or later", "", "")
)

risks.name: OLMOperatorsInFailedState
risks.message: The Operator Lifecycle Manager (OLM) operators can't be upgraded and may incorrectly report failed status.

promql.promql:
(
  group(csv_succeeded{_id=""})
  or
  0 * group(csv_count{_id=""})
)

  group by (resource) (max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id="",resource="egressips.k8s.ovn.org"}[1h]))

or on (_id)
0 * group(max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id=""}[1h]))

risks.name: ServiceAccountsOAuth
risks.message: ServiceAccounts cannot be used as OAuth2 clients in clusters where internal image registry is disabled.

promql.promql:
bottomk(1,
  0 * group by (deployment) (kube_deployment_spec_replicas{_id="",namespace="openshift-image-registry",deployment="image-registry"} > 0)
  or
  group(kube_deployment_spec_replicas{_id=""})
)

risks.name: AzureRegistryImageMigrationUserProvisioned
risks.message: In Azure clusters with the user-provisioned registry storage, the in-cluster image registry component may struggle to complete the cluster update.

promql.promql:
topk(1,
  group by (type) (cluster_infrastructure_provider{_id="",type="Azure"})
  or
  0 * group by (type) (cluster_infrastructure_provider{_id=""})
)
* on () group_left (secret)
topk(1,
  group by (secret) (kube_secret_info{_id="",namespace="openshift-image-registry",secret="image-registry-private-configuration-user"})
  or
  0 * group by (secret) (kube_secret_info{_id="",namespace="openshift-image-registry"})
)

  label_replace(group(ceph_health_status{_id=""}), "ceph", "yes", "", "")
  or
  label_replace(0 * group(cluster_version{_id=""}), "ceph", "no", "", "")
)

risks.name: SRIOVFailedToConfigureVF
risks.message: OCP Versions 4.14.34, 4.15.25, 4.16.7 and ALL subsequent versions include kernel datastructure changes which are not compatible with older versions of the SR-IOV operator. Please update SR-IOV operator to versions dated 20240826 or newer before updating OCP.

promql.promql:
group(csv_succeeded{_id="", name=~"sriov-network-operator[.].*"})
or
0 * group(csv_count{_id=""})

0 * group(max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id=""}[1h]))

risks.name: EarlyAPICertRotation
risks.message: Clusters born in 4.7 and earlier will trigger an api-int certificate authority rollout, and bugs in that rollout may break kubelet access to the Kubernetes API service.

promql.promql:
topk(1,
  label_replace(group by (version) (cluster_version{_id="",type="initial",version=~"4[.][0-9][.].*"}),"born_by_4_9", "yes, so possibly actually born in 4.7 or earlier", "", "")
  or
  label_replace(0 * group by (version) (cluster_version{_id="",type="initial",version!~"4[.][0-9][.].*"}),"born_by_4_9", "no, born in 4.10 or later", "", "")
)

risks.name: OLMOperatorsInFailedState
risks.message: The Operator Lifecycle Manager (OLM) operators can't be upgraded and may incorrectly report failed status.

promql.promql:
(
  group(csv_succeeded{_id=""})
  or
  0 * group(csv_count{_id=""})
)

risks.name: OVNIPsecConnectivity
risks.message: OVN clusters with enabled IPsec may lose pod to pod communication between a set of nodes which may impact overall functionality of the cluster and even cause production outage.

promql.promql:
(
  group by (ipsec) (label_replace(max_over_time(ovnkube_controller_ipsec_enabled{_id=""}[1h]), "ipsec", "enabled", "", "") == 1)
  or on (_id)
  0 * group by (ipsec) (label_replace(max_over_time(ovnkube_controller_ipsec_enabled{_id=""}[1h]), "ipsec", "disabled", "", "") == 0)
) and on (_id) (
  group by (resource) (max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id="",resource="egressips.k8s.ovn.org"}[1h]))
)
or on (_id)
0 * group(max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id=""}[1h]))

risks.name: OVNIPsecPausedMCPConnectivity
risks.message: OVN clusters with enabled IPsec with multiple worker MachineConfigPools may lose SDN connectivity during updates when at least one worker MCP is paused.

promql.promql:
(
  group by (ipsec) (label_replace(max_over_time(ovnkube_controller_ipsec_enabled{_id=""}[1h]), "ipsec", "enabled", "", "") == 1)
  or on (_id)
  0 * group by (ipsec) (label_replace(max_over_time(ovnkube_controller_ipsec_enabled{_id=""}[1h]), "ipsec", "disabled", "", "") == 0)
) and on (_id) (
  group by (resource) (max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id="",resource="egressips.k8s.ovn.org"}[1h]))
  and on (_id)
  group by (resource) (max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id="",resource="machineconfigpools.machineconfiguration.openshift.io"}[1h] ) > 2)
)
or on (_id)
0 * group(max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id=""}[1h]))

risks.name: ServiceAccountsOAuth
risks.message: ServiceAccounts cannot be used as OAuth2 clients in clusters where internal image registry is disabled.

promql.promql:
bottomk(1,
  0 * group by (deployment) (kube_deployment_spec_replicas{_id="",namespace="openshift-image-registry",deployment="image-registry"} > 0)
  or
  group(kube_deployment_spec_replicas{_id=""})
)

risks.name: HighNodeStatusReportFrequency
risks.message: An unintended reversion to the default kubelet nodeStatusReportFrequency can cause significant load on the control plane.

risks.name: AROBrokenDNSMasq
risks.message: Adding a new worker node will fail for clusters running on ARO

promql.promql:
(
  group(cluster_operator_conditions{name="aro"})
  or
  0 * group(cluster_operator_conditions)
)

risks.name: HyperShiftKubeAPIPort443
risks.message: Hosted/HyperShift clusters where HostedCluster spec.networking.apiServer.port is 443 can have trouble with Pods on compute Nodes connecting to the internal Kubernetes API service via the service IP.

promql.promql:
group by (_id, invoker) (cluster_installer{_id="",invoker="hypershift"})
or
0 * group by (_id, invoker) (cluster_installer{_id=""})

risks.name: HyperShiftNodePoolSkewBinaryDownload
risks.message: Hosted/HyperShift clusters where HostedCluster is on an exposed release can fail to create new nodes for NodePools on 4.14.(z<34) and 4.15.(z<23).

promql.promql:
group by (_id, invoker) (cluster_installer{_id="",invoker="hypershift"})
or
0 * group by (_id, invoker) (cluster_installer{_id=""})

risks.name: AzureRegistryImageMigrationUserProvisioned
risks.message: In Azure clusters with the user-provisioned registry storage, the in-cluster image registry component may struggle to complete the cluster update.

promql.promql:
topk(1,
  group by (type) (cluster_infrastructure_provider{_id="",type="Azure"})
  or
  0 * group by (type) (cluster_infrastructure_provider{_id=""})
)
* on () group_left (secret)
topk(1,
  group by (secret) (kube_secret_info{_id="",namespace="openshift-image-registry",secret="image-registry-private-configuration-user"})
  or
  0 * group by (secret) (kube_secret_info{_id="",namespace="openshift-image-registry"})
)

risks.name: SRIOVFailedToConfigureVF
risks.message: OCP Versions 4.14.34, 4.15.25, 4.16.7 and ALL subsequent versions include kernel datastructure changes which are not compatible with older versions of the SR-IOV operator. Please update SR-IOV operator to versions dated 20240826 or newer before updating OCP.

promql.promql:
group(csv_succeeded{_id="", name=~"sriov-network-operator[.].*"})
or
0 * group(csv_count{_id=""})

risks.name: AROBrokenDNSMasq
risks.message: Adding a new worker node will fail for clusters running on ARO.

promql.promql:
(
  group(cluster_operator_conditions{name="aro"})
  or
  0 * group(cluster_operator_conditions)
)

risks.name: CephCapDropPanic
risks.message: Nodes in clusters running workloads that mount Ceph volumes may experience kernel panics due to a CephFS client bug.

promql.promql:
topk(1,
  label_replace(group(ceph_health_status{_id=""}), "ceph", "yes", "", "")
  or
  label_replace(0 * group(cluster_version{_id=""}), "ceph", "no", "", "")
)

risks.name: AWSCustomDomainNodesNotReady
risks.message: Nodes on AWS with custom domain names will go to NotReady state.

promql.promql:
(

  or
  0 * group by (type) (cluster_infrastructure_provider{_id=""})
)

  0 * group by (secret) (kube_secret_info{_id="",namespace="openshift-image-registry"})
)
